name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
description: Housing scheme to provide affordable housing to all eligible families by 2022.
eligibility: Families with annual income up to Rs. 3 lakhs, no house ownership.
benefits: Financial assistance up to Rs. 2.5 lakhs for house construction.

name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
description: Employment scheme guaranteeing 100 days of wage employment to rural households.
eligibility: Adult members of rural households willing to do unskilled manual work.
benefits: Legal guarantee of 100 days of employment in a financial year.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: Income support scheme for farmers to supplement their financial needs.
eligibility: All small and marginal farmers with cultivable landholding.
benefits: Rs. 6,000 per year in three equal installments.

name: Swachh Bharat Mission (Gramin)
description: Campaign to improve sanitation facilities in rural areas.
benefits: Financial assistance for toilet construction and waste management.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance scheme to provide financial support to farmers suffering crop loss/damage.
eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas.
benefits: Insurance coverage and financial support in case of crop failure.

name: National Rural Livelihood Mission (NRLM)
description: Poverty alleviation program focused on promoting self-employment and organization of rural poor.
eligibility: Rural poor, especially women self-help groups.
benefits: Financial assistance, skill development, and market linkages.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
description: Financial inclusion program to provide banking services to all households.
eligibility: All Indian citizens above 10 years of age.
benefits: Zero balance bank account, RuPay debit card, insurance coverage.

name: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana
description: Health insurance scheme providing coverage up to Rs. 5 lakhs per family per year.
eligibility: Families identified through Socio-Economic Caste Census (SECC) 2011.
benefits: Cashless treatment up to Rs. 5 lakhs per family per year.

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
description: LPG connection scheme for women from BPL households.
eligibility: Women from BPL families, SC/ST, PMAY, AAY beneficiaries.
benefits: Free LPG connection with financial assistance for refills.

name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
description: Micro-finance scheme to provide loans to small businesses and entrepreneurs.
benefits: Collateral-free loans up to Rs. 10 lakhs.

name: National Social Assistance Programme (NSAP)
description: Social security scheme for elderly, widows, and disabled persons.
eligibility: BPL families with elderly (60+), widows, disabled persons.
benefits: Monthly pension ranging from Rs. 200 to Rs. 500.

name: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY)
description: Rural road connectivity program to connect villages with all-weather roads.
eligibility: Villages with population 500+ (250+ in hilly/tribal areas).
benefits: All-weather road connectivity to improve rural accessibility.

name: Mid Day Meal Scheme
description: School meal program to improve nutritional status of school children.
eligibility: Children studying in government and aided schools (Classes I-VIII).
benefits: Free cooked meals during school days.

name: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
description: Scheme to address declining child sex ratio and promote girl child education.
eligibility: All girl children and their families.
benefits: Awareness campaigns, educational support, and financial incentives.

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana
description: Irrigation scheme to expand cultivated area with assured irrigation.
eligibility: All farmers, with focus on small and marginal farmers.
benefits: Financial assistance for micro-irrigation and water conservation.

name: Stand Up India
description: Scheme to promote entrepreneurship among SC/ST and women entrepreneurs.
eligibility: SC/ST and women entrepreneurs aged 18 years and above.
benefits: Bank loans between Rs. 10 lakhs to Rs. 1 crore.
